location.description: The Azure Region where the Resource Group should exist. Changing this forces a new Resource Group to be created.

name.description: The Name which should be used for this Resource Group. Changing this forces a new Resource Group to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags which should be assigned to the Resource Group.

id.description: The ID of the Resource Group.

create.description: Used when creating the Resource Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Resource Group.

update.description: Used when updating the Resource Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Resource Group.
